entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VS refactor suggests an incorrect pattern matching for `!(a?b is true | false)` #64292
  • Error when applying the IDE0059 rule on code with simplified 'new' expression #64291
  • VS2022 C# cannot remove IDE0220 code style warnings #64289
  • Intellisense does not recognize start of string, changes "D: to "Date: #64280
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32926.152 #64293
  • Roslyn incorrectly report some API as `Not Available ⚠` in IntelliSense list for mulit targetframeworks projects #58478
    17.4
  • Update refereneces to release version for 17.2 rtw #60873
    17.3
  • Hard select default item from IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource when filter text is empty #61120
    17.3
  • VSIX fails to install on DartLab integration pipeline #63770
    Backlog
  • Confusing error message assigning `in` parameter reference to `ref` field #62756
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • include source-generated documents in remote inheritance-margin call #64297
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64296
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Make remaining managed pointer type scenarios warnings #64294
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Update SymbolDisplay API to include scoped for parameters and locals #64285
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • [LSP] Add missing project context handler for ts #64284
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Merge features/CLaSP into main #64282
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Inline Hints - Add narrator support to parameter hints. #64281
    Area-IDE
  • Enhance rule metadata and suppression info in SARIF V2 errorlog #64277
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Update ref `foreach` tests #64276
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Rename Binder.*Scope constants #64288
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64301
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64300
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #64298
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE
  • Example is not packable #64133
    Area-IDE
  • [EnC] Follow up on deleting properties and events etc. #64034
    Area-Compilers
  • Make IPreviewService async, or synchronous with threading requirements #63661
    Area-IDE
  • Use AdditionalFilterTexts in enum member completion #64261
    Area-IDE
  • Improve SyntaxTree/Node.Dump() #62703
    Area-Compilers
  • Disallow methods with bodies in ComImport interfaces. #64257
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Rename SymbolCompletionProvider to RecommendationServiceBasedCompletionProvider #64026
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor RunTests #63948
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Infraswat
  • Colorize langword inside doc comments #63900
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fixed nullable warning for "change cast type" refactoring #64080
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Format parameters as names in error messages #64179
    Area-Compilers
